object.script:
i = 0 inputX = 0 inputY = 0 isPressed = false
--Ecran 64x64 function onTick() --Define IsPressingRectangle table -> used in the for loop afterwards isPressingRectangle = {}
-- Read the touchscreen data from the script's composite input inputX = input.getNumber(3) inputY = input.getNumber(4) isPressed = input.getBool(1)
for i = 1, 4, 1 do --Check if user is pressing the tabs isPressingRectangle[i] = isPressed and isPointInRectangle(inputX, inputY, 5+3, 12*i+1, 54, 8)
--Actions if tabs are being pressed if isPressingRectangle[i] then output.setBool(14+i, isPressingRectangle[i]) output.setBool(14+i, 0) output.setBool(18+i, isPressingRectangle[i]) output.setNumber(18+i, 1) end end end
-- Returns true if the point (x, y) is inside the rectangle at (rectX, rectY) with width rectW and height rectH function isPointInRectangle(x, y, rectX, rectY, rectW, rectH) return x > rectX and y > rectY and x < rectX+rectW and y < rectY+rectH end
-- Draw function that will be executed when this script renders to a screen function onDraw() --Define the tab titles Titles = {} Titles[1] = "ENGINE" Titles[2] = "MAP" Titles[3] = "FCS" Titles[4] = "ARMAMENT"
screen.setColor(0, 255, 0)
--Draw the border screen.drawRect(1, 1, 62, 62)
--Draw menu on the top left corner screen.drawText(3, 3, "MENU")
--Draw each tab + titles in them for i = 1, 4, 1 do screen.drawRect(5, 12*i, 54, 8) screen.drawTextBox(5+3, 12*i+1, 54, 8, Titles[i], -1, 0) if (TF==true) then screen.drawClear() end end end

--Engine = { --CoolantTemp = 1, --CoolantPressure = 1, --EngineTemp = 1, --AirTemp =1, --RPS = 1, --}
--Tick function that will be executed every logic tick function isPointInRectangle(x, y, rectX, rectY, rectW, rectH) return x > rectX and y > rectY and x < rectX+rectW and y < rectY+rectH end
function onTick() ----------DATA INPUT--------- --Engine.AirTemp = input.getNumber(6) --Get the air temperature (air intake temp for auxiliary cooling circuit) --Engine.CoolantTemp = input.getNumber(9) --Get the coolant temperature value --Engine.CoolantPressure = input.getNumber(10) --Get the coolant pressure value --Engine.EngineTemp = input.getNumber(11) --Get the engine temperature value --Engine.RPS = input.getNumber(13) --Get the shaft rotations per second value ----------------------------------
----INTERACTION INPUT--- isPressingRectangle = {} inputX = input.getNumber(3) inputY = input.getNumber(4) isPressed = input.getBool(1) ----------------------------
--for i = 1,4,1 do --Check if the player is pressing menus --isPressingRectangle[i] = isPressed and isPointInRectangle(inputX, inputY, 5, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5)
--if(isPressingRectangle[i]) --then --screenSwitch(i) --end --end
end
--Draw function that will be executed when this script renders to a screen function onDraw() Title = {} --Titles of the several tabs Title[1] = "FCS" Title[2] = "Menu"
w = screen.getWidth() --Get width and height in vars h = screen.getHeight()
screen.setColor(0, 255, 0) screen.drawRect(w * 0.013, h * 0.013, w * 0.97, h * 0.97) --Draw a rect in the center of the monit screen.drawText(w * 0.05, h * 0.05, Title[1]) --Write tab title to the monit
--for i = 1,4,1 do --Draw several tabs
--Responsive-design-\/-- --screen.drawRect(w * 0.1, h * (i * 0.15) + 0.05 * h, w * 0.8, h * 0.15) --screen.drawRect(w * (0.2 * i) - 0.1 * w, h * 0.80, w * 0.2, h * 0.1) --screen.drawTextBox(w * 0.1 + w * 0.02 + 1, h * (i * 0.15) + 0.05 * h + 1, w * 0.8, h * 0.15, Title[i], -1, 0) ------------------------
--screen.drawRect(5, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5) --screen.drawTextBox(8, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5, Title[i], -1, 0) --end end

i = 0 inputX = 0 inputY = 0 isPressed = false Test = false Test2 = false
--Ecran 64x64 function onTick() --Define IsPressingRectangle table -> used in the for loop afterwards
-- Read the touchscreen data from the script's composite input inputX = input.getNumber(3) inputY = input.getNumber(4) isPressed = input.getBool(1) Test2 = input.getBool(16)
--Check if user is pressing the tabs isPressingRectangle = isPressed and isPointInRectangle(inputX, inputY, 41, 1, 22, 8)
--Actions if tabs are being pressed if isPressingRectangle then output.setBool(15, isPressingRectangle) output.setBool(15, 0) output.setBool(16, isPressingRectangle) output.setBool(16, 0) test = true end end
-- Returns true if the point (x, y) is inside the rectangle at (rectX, rectY) with width rectW and height rectH function isPointInRectangle(x, y, rectX, rectY, rectW, rectH) return x > rectX and y > rectY and x < rectX+rectW and y < rectY+rectH end
-- Draw function that will be executed when this script renders to a screen function onDraw() --Define the tab titles Titles = {} Titles[1] = "ENGINE" Titles[2] = "MENU"
screen.setColor(0, 255, 0)
--Draw the border screen.drawRect(1, 1, 62, 62)
--Draw engine on the top left corner screen.drawText(3, 3, Titles[1])
--Draw menu on the top right corner screen.drawRect(41, 1, 22, 8) screen.drawTextBox(43, 2, 21, 8, Titles[2], -1, 0)
if(Test==true) then screen.drawText(32, 32, "Meow") end if(Test2==true) then screen.drawText(32, 48, "MeowTwoT") end --if(Test2==false) --then --screen.drawText(32, 48, "MeowTwoF") --end
--Draw each tab + titles in them --for i = 1, 4, 1 --do --screen.drawRect(5, 12*i, 54, 8) --screen.drawTextBox(5+3, 12*i+1, 54, 8, Titles[i], -1, 0) --end end

--Engine = { --CoolantTemp = 1, --CoolantPressure = 1, --EngineTemp = 1, --AirTemp =1, --RPS = 1, --}
--Tick function that will be executed every logic tick function isPointInRectangle(x, y, rectX, rectY, rectW, rectH) return x > rectX and y > rectY and x < rectX+rectW and y < rectY+rectH end
function onTick() ----------DATA INPUT--------- --Engine.AirTemp = input.getNumber(6) --Get the air temperature (air intake temp for auxiliary cooling circuit) --Engine.CoolantTemp = input.getNumber(9) --Get the coolant temperature value --Engine.CoolantPressure = input.getNumber(10) --Get the coolant pressure value --Engine.EngineTemp = input.getNumber(11) --Get the engine temperature value --Engine.RPS = input.getNumber(13) --Get the shaft rotations per second value ----------------------------------
----INTERACTION INPUT--- isPressingRectangle = {} inputX = input.getNumber(3) inputY = input.getNumber(4) isPressed = input.getBool(1) ----------------------------
--for i = 1,4,1 do --Check if the player is pressing menus --isPressingRectangle[i] = isPressed and isPointInRectangle(inputX, inputY, 5, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5)
--if(isPressingRectangle[i]) --then --screenSwitch(i) --end --end
end
--Draw function that will be executed when this script renders to a screen function onDraw() Title = {} --Titles of the several tabs Title[1] = "MAP" Title[2] = "Menu"
w = screen.getWidth() --Get width and height in vars h = screen.getHeight()
screen.setColor(0, 255, 0) screen.drawRect(w * 0.013, h * 0.013, w * 0.97, h * 0.97) --Draw a rect in the center of the monit screen.drawText(w * 0.05, h * 0.05, Title[1]) --Write tab title to the monit
--for i = 1,4,1 do --Draw several tabs
--Responsive-design-\/-- --screen.drawRect(w * 0.1, h * (i * 0.15) + 0.05 * h, w * 0.8, h * 0.15) --screen.drawRect(w * (0.2 * i) - 0.1 * w, h * 0.80, w * 0.2, h * 0.1) --screen.drawTextBox(w * 0.1 + w * 0.02 + 1, h * (i * 0.15) + 0.05 * h + 1, w * 0.8, h * 0.15, Title[i], -1, 0) ------------------------
--screen.drawRect(5, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5) --screen.drawTextBox(8, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5, Title[i], -1, 0) --end end

--Engine = { --CoolantTemp = 1, --CoolantPressure = 1, --EngineTemp = 1, --AirTemp =1, --RPS = 1, --}
--Tick function that will be executed every logic tick function isPointInRectangle(x, y, rectX, rectY, rectW, rectH) return x > rectX and y > rectY and x < rectX+rectW and y < rectY+rectH end
function onTick() ----------DATA INPUT--------- --Engine.AirTemp = input.getNumber(6) --Get the air temperature (air intake temp for auxiliary cooling circuit) --Engine.CoolantTemp = input.getNumber(9) --Get the coolant temperature value --Engine.CoolantPressure = input.getNumber(10) --Get the coolant pressure value --Engine.EngineTemp = input.getNumber(11) --Get the engine temperature value --Engine.RPS = input.getNumber(13) --Get the shaft rotations per second value ----------------------------------
----INTERACTION INPUT--- isPressingRectangle = {} inputX = input.getNumber(3) inputY = input.getNumber(4) isPressed = input.getBool(1) ----------------------------
--for i = 1,4,1 do --Check if the player is pressing menus --isPressingRectangle[i] = isPressed and isPointInRectangle(inputX, inputY, 5, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5)
--if(isPressingRectangle[i]) --then --screenSwitch(i) --end --end
end
--Draw function that will be executed when this script renders to a screen function onDraw() Title = {} --Titles of the several tabs Title[1] = "ARMAMENT" Title[2] = "Menu"
w = screen.getWidth() --Get width and height in vars h = screen.getHeight()
screen.setColor(0, 255, 0) screen.drawRect(w * 0.013, h * 0.013, w * 0.97, h * 0.97) --Draw a rect in the center of the monit screen.drawText(w * 0.05, h * 0.05, Title[1]) --Write tab title to the monit
--for i = 1,4,1 do --Draw several tabs
--Responsive-design-\/-- --screen.drawRect(w * 0.1, h * (i * 0.15) + 0.05 * h, w * 0.8, h * 0.15) --screen.drawRect(w * (0.2 * i) - 0.1 * w, h * 0.80, w * 0.2, h * 0.1) --screen.drawTextBox(w * 0.1 + w * 0.02 + 1, h * (i * 0.15) + 0.05 * h + 1, w * 0.8, h * 0.15, Title[i], -1, 0) ------------------------
--screen.drawRect(5, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5) --screen.drawTextBox(8, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5, Title[i], -1, 0) --end end

c0.script:
i = 0 inputX = 0 inputY = 0 isPressed = false
--Ecran 64x64 function onTick() --Define IsPressingRectangle table -> used in the for loop afterwards isPressingRectangle = {}
-- Read the touchscreen data from the script's composite input inputX = input.getNumber(3) inputY = input.getNumber(4) isPressed = input.getBool(1)
for i = 1, 4, 1 do --Check if user is pressing the tabs isPressingRectangle[i] = isPressed and isPointInRectangle(inputX, inputY, 5+3, 12*i+1, 54, 8)
--Actions if tabs are being pressed if isPressingRectangle[i] then output.setBool(14+i, isPressingRectangle[i]) output.setBool(14+i, 0) output.setBool(18+i, isPressingRectangle[i]) output.setNumber(18+i, 1) end end end
-- Returns true if the point (x, y) is inside the rectangle at (rectX, rectY) with width rectW and height rectH function isPointInRectangle(x, y, rectX, rectY, rectW, rectH) return x > rectX and y > rectY and x < rectX+rectW and y < rectY+rectH end
-- Draw function that will be executed when this script renders to a screen function onDraw() --Define the tab titles Titles = {} Titles[1] = "ENGINE" Titles[2] = "MAP" Titles[3] = "FCS" Titles[4] = "ARMAMENT"
screen.setColor(0, 255, 0)
--Draw the border screen.drawRect(1, 1, 62, 62)
--Draw menu on the top left corner screen.drawText(3, 3, "MENU")
--Draw each tab + titles in them for i = 1, 4, 1 do screen.drawRect(5, 12*i, 54, 8) screen.drawTextBox(5+3, 12*i+1, 54, 8, Titles[i], -1, 0) if (TF==true) then screen.drawClear() end end end

c5.script:
--Engine = { --CoolantTemp = 1, --CoolantPressure = 1, --EngineTemp = 1, --AirTemp =1, --RPS = 1, --}
--Tick function that will be executed every logic tick function isPointInRectangle(x, y, rectX, rectY, rectW, rectH) return x > rectX and y > rectY and x < rectX+rectW and y < rectY+rectH end
function onTick() ----------DATA INPUT--------- --Engine.AirTemp = input.getNumber(6) --Get the air temperature (air intake temp for auxiliary cooling circuit) --Engine.CoolantTemp = input.getNumber(9) --Get the coolant temperature value --Engine.CoolantPressure = input.getNumber(10) --Get the coolant pressure value --Engine.EngineTemp = input.getNumber(11) --Get the engine temperature value --Engine.RPS = input.getNumber(13) --Get the shaft rotations per second value ----------------------------------
----INTERACTION INPUT--- isPressingRectangle = {} inputX = input.getNumber(3) inputY = input.getNumber(4) isPressed = input.getBool(1) ----------------------------
--for i = 1,4,1 do --Check if the player is pressing menus --isPressingRectangle[i] = isPressed and isPointInRectangle(inputX, inputY, 5, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5)
--if(isPressingRectangle[i]) --then --screenSwitch(i) --end --end
end
--Draw function that will be executed when this script renders to a screen function onDraw() Title = {} --Titles of the several tabs Title[1] = "FCS" Title[2] = "Menu"
w = screen.getWidth() --Get width and height in vars h = screen.getHeight()
screen.setColor(0, 255, 0) screen.drawRect(w * 0.013, h * 0.013, w * 0.97, h * 0.97) --Draw a rect in the center of the monit screen.drawText(w * 0.05, h * 0.05, Title[1]) --Write tab title to the monit
--for i = 1,4,1 do --Draw several tabs
--Responsive-design-\/-- --screen.drawRect(w * 0.1, h * (i * 0.15) + 0.05 * h, w * 0.8, h * 0.15) --screen.drawRect(w * (0.2 * i) - 0.1 * w, h * 0.80, w * 0.2, h * 0.1) --screen.drawTextBox(w * 0.1 + w * 0.02 + 1, h * (i * 0.15) + 0.05 * h + 1, w * 0.8, h * 0.15, Title[i], -1, 0) ------------------------
--screen.drawRect(5, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5) --screen.drawTextBox(8, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5, Title[i], -1, 0) --end end

i = 0 inputX = 0 inputY = 0 isPressed = false Test = false Test2 = false
--Ecran 64x64 function onTick() --Define IsPressingRectangle table -> used in the for loop afterwards
-- Read the touchscreen data from the script's composite input inputX = input.getNumber(3) inputY = input.getNumber(4) isPressed = input.getBool(1) Test2 = input.getBool(16)
--Check if user is pressing the tabs isPressingRectangle = isPressed and isPointInRectangle(inputX, inputY, 41, 1, 22, 8)
--Actions if tabs are being pressed if isPressingRectangle then output.setBool(15, isPressingRectangle) output.setBool(15, 0) output.setBool(16, isPressingRectangle) output.setBool(16, 0) test = true end end
-- Returns true if the point (x, y) is inside the rectangle at (rectX, rectY) with width rectW and height rectH function isPointInRectangle(x, y, rectX, rectY, rectW, rectH) return x > rectX and y > rectY and x < rectX+rectW and y < rectY+rectH end
-- Draw function that will be executed when this script renders to a screen function onDraw() --Define the tab titles Titles = {} Titles[1] = "ENGINE" Titles[2] = "MENU"
screen.setColor(0, 255, 0)
--Draw the border screen.drawRect(1, 1, 62, 62)
--Draw engine on the top left corner screen.drawText(3, 3, Titles[1])
--Draw menu on the top right corner screen.drawRect(41, 1, 22, 8) screen.drawTextBox(43, 2, 21, 8, Titles[2], -1, 0)
if(Test==true) then screen.drawText(32, 32, "Meow") end if(Test2==true) then screen.drawText(32, 48, "MeowTwoT") end --if(Test2==false) --then --screen.drawText(32, 48, "MeowTwoF") --end
--Draw each tab + titles in them --for i = 1, 4, 1 --do --screen.drawRect(5, 12*i, 54, 8) --screen.drawTextBox(5+3, 12*i+1, 54, 8, Titles[i], -1, 0) --end end

c7.script:
--Engine = { --CoolantTemp = 1, --CoolantPressure = 1, --EngineTemp = 1, --AirTemp =1, --RPS = 1, --}
--Tick function that will be executed every logic tick function isPointInRectangle(x, y, rectX, rectY, rectW, rectH) return x > rectX and y > rectY and x < rectX+rectW and y < rectY+rectH end
function onTick() ----------DATA INPUT--------- --Engine.AirTemp = input.getNumber(6) --Get the air temperature (air intake temp for auxiliary cooling circuit) --Engine.CoolantTemp = input.getNumber(9) --Get the coolant temperature value --Engine.CoolantPressure = input.getNumber(10) --Get the coolant pressure value --Engine.EngineTemp = input.getNumber(11) --Get the engine temperature value --Engine.RPS = input.getNumber(13) --Get the shaft rotations per second value ----------------------------------
----INTERACTION INPUT--- isPressingRectangle = {} inputX = input.getNumber(3) inputY = input.getNumber(4) isPressed = input.getBool(1) ----------------------------
--for i = 1,4,1 do --Check if the player is pressing menus --isPressingRectangle[i] = isPressed and isPointInRectangle(inputX, inputY, 5, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5)
--if(isPressingRectangle[i]) --then --screenSwitch(i) --end --end
end
--Draw function that will be executed when this script renders to a screen function onDraw() Title = {} --Titles of the several tabs Title[1] = "MAP" Title[2] = "Menu"
w = screen.getWidth() --Get width and height in vars h = screen.getHeight()
screen.setColor(0, 255, 0) screen.drawRect(w * 0.013, h * 0.013, w * 0.97, h * 0.97) --Draw a rect in the center of the monit screen.drawText(w * 0.05, h * 0.05, Title[1]) --Write tab title to the monit
--for i = 1,4,1 do --Draw several tabs
--Responsive-design-\/-- --screen.drawRect(w * 0.1, h * (i * 0.15) + 0.05 * h, w * 0.8, h * 0.15) --screen.drawRect(w * (0.2 * i) - 0.1 * w, h * 0.80, w * 0.2, h * 0.1) --screen.drawTextBox(w * 0.1 + w * 0.02 + 1, h * (i * 0.15) + 0.05 * h + 1, w * 0.8, h * 0.15, Title[i], -1, 0) ------------------------
--screen.drawRect(5, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5) --screen.drawTextBox(8, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5, Title[i], -1, 0) --end end

function onTick() ----------DATA INPUT--------- --Engine.AirTemp = input.getNumber(6) --Get the air temperature (air intake temp for auxiliary cooling circuit) --Engine.CoolantTemp = input.getNumber(9) --Get the coolant temperature value --Engine.CoolantPressure = input.getNumber(10) --Get the coolant pressure value --Engine.EngineTemp = input.getNumber(11) --Get the engine temperature value --Engine.RPS = input.getNumber(13) --Get the shaft rotations per second value ----------------------------------

w = screen.getWidth() --Get width and height in vars h = screen.getHeight()

--screen.drawRect(5, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5) --screen.drawTextBox(8, 11.5*i+1, 55, 11.5, Title[i], -1, 0) --end end
